column4: hey i just installed mythtv, it's asking me to run a program as the mythtv user, how can i change to that user?
you can use su to change users
but i never got told the password
su - mythtv? If you used the "-" there it won't work
might have to put sudo in front of that
sudo mythtv is a command, not entering a user state
additionally you should look into just adding your user ID to the mythtv group
